antichess.viewgui
Class ImageMap

java.lang.Object
  antichess.viewgui.ImageMap

public class ImageMap
extends Object

ImageMap is a class for loading and storing images. Images are loaded based off their name from the directory specified when the ImageMap is being created. Images are later referenced by their name. Format of Files Images in the directory are expected to be gifs with an end of .gif The specfield directory must not end in an / such that the actual pathname for an image to be loaded is directory+imageName. For example: directory = "images", name = "king" will load images/king.gif

Specification Fields
  • directory //String - stores the parent directory // that images are searched for in.
  • map //Map map maps a string to an image

                   throws IllegalArgumentException
